Name: Chocolate Sidecar
Ingredients: 22.5 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
RIM glass with chocolate powder and sugar (moisten outside of rim with sugar syrup and dip into chocolate and sugar mix).
Review: Cognac-laced chocolate with port wine complexity and sugary richness balanced by lime juice.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2005 by Wayne Collins for Maxxium UK. Sidecar cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Chocolate Sidecar contains 192 calories
